TV:*??? <??> >> ?? ?? ???&????
TV:*We're out of range here, I already like this flat... You look tired, I think you should go sleep.
$question nocap 3
Are you sure we out of range?
I don't want to sleep
Finally we can relax
$go 3
$go 4
$go 5
$3:
You:*I don't think we're out of radius. I saw the map and we are on the wrong side of the border. Look
TV:*It's terrible, we need to go to another building as soon as possible, but on the other hand, it’s only an hour before the emission and border line is too far... I don’t know. Maybe we can get out of range if we will run... Pack your things.
$cmd goOut=true
$end
$4:
TV:*Maybe you want to eat? I have some food in my backpack, you can take it.
$end
$5:
$cmd goOut=false
$end
